introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern deploys an AWS Lambda PowerShell custom runtime for running native PowerShell on Lambda. The pattern includes am example Lambda function in PowerShell.

bullets.text: Introducing the PowerShell custom runtime for AWS Lambda
